description: Provide an MCP server interface for the WaPulse WhatsApp Web API, enabling integration and interaction with WhatsApp Web through the Model Context Protocol. Facilitate seamless communication and automation for clients using MCP-compatible tools and resources.

capabilities.name: send_whatsapp_message
capabilities.description: Send a WhatsApp message to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: send_whatsapp_files
capabilities.description: Send files (images, documents, etc.) to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: send_whatsapp_audio
capabilities.description: Send audio messages (voice notes, music, etc.) to a specific phone number or group using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: load_chat_messages
capabilities.description: Retrieve all messages from a specific chat or conversation using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: check_id_exists
capabilities.description: Check if a specific user or group ID exists in WhatsApp using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: validate_phone_number
capabilities.description: Validate if a phone number is in the correct format for WaPulse API

capabilities.name: get_all_chats
capabilities.description: Get all WhatsApp chats (individual and group conversations) for an instance using WaPulse API

capabilities.name: get_wapulse_documentation
capabilities.description: Fetch and search WaPulse API documentation from the official website

capabilities.name: create_whatsapp_group
capabilities.description: Create a new WhatsApp group with specified participants

capabilities.name: add_group_participants
capabilities.description: Add new participants to an existing WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: remove_group_participants
capabilities.description: Remove participants from an existing WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: promote_group_participants
capabilities.description: Promote participants to admin status in a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: demote_group_participants
capabilities.description: Demote participants from admin status in a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: leave_whatsapp_group
capabilities.description: Leave a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: get_group_invite_link
capabilities.description: Get the invite link for a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: change_group_invite_code
capabilities.description: Change the invite code for a WhatsApp group, generating a new invite link

capabilities.name: get_group_requests
capabilities.description: Get pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: reject_group_request
capabilities.description: Reject pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: approve_group_request
capabilities.description: Approve pending join requests for a WhatsApp group

capabilities.name: get_all_groups
capabilities.description: Get all WhatsApp groups for an instance

capabilities.name: create_instance
capabilities.description: Create a new WhatsApp instance

capabilities.name: get_qr_code
capabilities.description: Get QR code for WhatsApp Web connection

capabilities.name: start_instance
capabilities.description: Start a WhatsApp instance to begin receiving and sending messages

capabilities.name: stop_instance
capabilities.description: Stop a running WhatsApp instance

capabilities.name: delete_instance
capabilities.description: Permanently delete a WhatsApp instance
